extensionDescription.message: Open tabs in Chrome's side panel for better multitasking

newTab.description: Text for creating a new tab

welcome.message: Welcome to Side Panel Tab Manager

welcomeInstructions.message: Click the '+' button above to open a new tab in the side panel

openCurrentTab.description: Button to open the current tab in side panel

defaultSearchEngine.description: Label for default search engine setting

restrictedPageTitle.message: This page cannot be opened in the side panel

restrictedPageDescription.message: Gmail, Google Drive, and some secure sites are restricted in the side panel for security reasons.

openInRegularTab.message: Please open this page in a regular tab.

errorLoadingPage.message: This page is not working properly in the side panel.
errorLoadingPage.description: Error message when page fails to load

restrictedSites.message: Gmail, Google Drive, and some secure sites may be restricted in the side panel.

welcomeNotificationMessage.message: Extension successfully installed. Click the extension icon to open tabs in the side panel.

restrictedNotificationMessage.message: This page cannot be opened in the side panel.
